post.body: you are one funny guy this fine a.m. - did you get your swerve on last night? ;-)
YOU ROCK!!
ooo! how about goodnight moon??
@michelsavoie @heathershorter can't you people keep it down - i'm trying to sleep over here!!!
oooooo nice list!
lol ah ok - i thought i was going to learn something new tonight!
special how??
hey! yep, posted earlier today. :-) doing ok - urself?
well he just came out of nowhere so chances are you are next
lol it all counts.
ME TOO DAMMIT!!!!!!!!!
yayyyyy!!!!!!
will u do a shot of something in my honor?
LOL - ill spare the world.
im looking for storage on target.com. and furniture on westelm.com. kris is playing wii. i can see his butt crack.
i thought we were on hatin' holiday? and we're all God's children...for why shall there be hate?
but he's so inspirational. i find myself forgetting to change the channel. praise Jesus.
its the only way i roll.
OMG...shoot that poison arrow through my HHEEEE-AARRRR-TTT. lol
nah just sending u another good ABC song as you just posted one. they sound so GAYGAYGAYGAYGAY, dont they?
me too. ur not so bad. at least not until jan 1. christmas was great - it was nice to be with family again. how was urs?
i just read that to kris and we're both lol
guess what?!?! i'm going to shower now...NOT at 5pm!! its only taken me 2 weeks to get here. lol
i just got befriended by 'long phamdizzle' on facebook. this profile is HYSTERICAL.

i w-w-w-w-wonder...WHY...a-whywhywhywhywhy...she ran awayyyyy ♫ http://blip.fm/~1bbjh
